item.title: FT Most Read: Thursday, June 13, 2024 at 11:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Starmer sets out plans to raise £8.6bn in tax in Labour manifesto
2. Wells Fargo fires workers for ‘simulating’ being at their keyboards
3. Segantii bet against Canada Goose after call with Morgan Stanley
4. Nigel Farage’s Reform UK overtakes Conservatives in new opinion poll
5. [Opinion] How the wrong chaps took charge of British politics
item.guid: FT Most Read: Thursday, June 13, 2024 at 11:15 PM UTC
